GRAMOPHONE RECORDS
Betelnut is strewn in the pandal and the bride's mother is picking them with bended knees. The bride's mother who was picking with bended knees was trodden over,
41
Bun (edibles) were prepared and hidden in the roof, rats eat it and the bridegroom's mother is looking for it with open mouth to the roof.
SL
The bride's father is roaming about the odda street in search of brides with a big turban on his head. There is none to offer bride.
The bridegroom's father prepared his meal in the water of the stream, bathed in water of a pond and offers his prayers in the water on a dung hill, drag the bridegroom's father who is offering prayers in dung hill water after slapping on his cheeks.
The bride's mother came before the marriage. She was a huge figure. The door would not hold her and the house would not hold her. Drag the bride's mother after removing the door.
The onions blosom, the onions yield and so the two eyes of the bride's mother are ripe and watering. Drag the bride's mother with watering eyes to the pandal.
